welcome.title: Select Base Currency
welcome.description: Your base currency should ideally be the one you use most often. All transactions in other currencies will be calculated based on this one.

errors.unableToLoadCurrencies: Unable to load currencies list. Try later
errors.unableToSetCurrency: Unexpected error. Cannot set base currency. Please try later or contact support.

accessDenied.signIn: Sign in was cancelled or access was denied
accessDenied.signUp: Sign up was cancelled or access was denied
accessDenied.link: Linking was cancelled or access was denied

userAlreadyExists.signIn: An account with this email already exists
userAlreadyExists.signUp: An account with this email already exists
userAlreadyExists.link: This account is already linked to another user

accountNotLinked.signIn: No account found with this email. Please sign up first.
accountNotLinked.signUp: Failed to create account. Please try again.
accountNotLinked.link: Failed to link account. Please try again.

genericError.signIn: Failed to sign in. Please try again.
genericError.signUp: Failed to sign up. Please try again.
genericError.link: Failed to link account. Please try again.

errors.unauthorizedClient: This application is not authorized to use this authentication method
errors.temporarilyUnavailable: The authentication service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
